trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_SEQ_00<tab>Cahciua is ready to head to the fourth and final zone.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Cahciua.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the Windspath Gardens guard.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Cahciua.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Cahciua again.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_WUKLAMAT_000_001<tab>Next, we have to part with...
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_GRAHATIA_000_005<tab>Just one zone remaining...
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_KRILE_000_010<tab>Their memories may be gone, but their love will be with me always...
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_ERENVILLE_000_015<tab>...
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_CAHCIUA_000_020<tab>I must say, the closer we get to the end, the faster time seems to pass us by.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_CAHCIUA_000_021<tab>Come, let's head to the fourth and final zone. By now you know how to get there, yes?
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_WUKLAMAT_000_022<tab>Yes, we do.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_CAHCIUA_000_023<tab>Excellent. This time, I'd like to quickly check on the Meso Terminal, so I'll meet you at the Gate of Remembrance.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_WUKLAMAT_000_024<tab>Come on, everyone...
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_WUKLAMAT_000_025<tab>Oh, Erenville...
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_GRAHATIA_000_030<tab>So this is it...
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_KRILE_000_035<tab>Like before, it will be hard, but we must honor Cahciua's wish.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_ERENVILLE_000_040<tab>...
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_CAHCIUA_000_050<tab>As far as I can tell, we still have some leeway with the Meso Terminal.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_CAHCIUA_000_051<tab>Meaning you can carry on getting to know the Endless in the last zone.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_CAHCIUA_000_052<tab>Windspath Gardens, it's called, and it's breathtakingly beautiful!
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_ERENVILLE_000_053<tab>That's where your memories are stored, yes?
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_CAHCIUA_000_054<tab>That's right. I left it for last so I could guide you for as long as possible. Very thoughtful of me, yes?
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_CAHCIUA_000_055<tab>Ooh! A great idea just occurred to me!
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_WUKLAMAT_000_056<tab>What might that be?
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_CAHCIUA_000_057<tab><chuckle> I'll save it for after we've arrived on the other side. See you there!
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_ERENVILLE_000_058<tab>Her “great ideas” are generally less than great.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_WUKLAMAT_000_059<tab>Hey, Erenville?
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_WUKLAMAT_000_060<tab>As much as I want to grant your mother her wish, I also want to respect yours.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_WUKLAMAT_000_061<tab>When all's said and done, I want you to be happy. I hope you know this.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_ERENVILLE_000_062<tab>I know.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_ERENVILLE_000_063<tab>I know...
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_WUKLAMAT_000_064<tab>Cahciua isn't only his mother─she's his mentor as well. That can only make it harder for him to say good-bye.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_WUKLAMAT_000_065<tab>Let's go. For now, we keep doing what we've been doing: seeking out Endless and learning what's dear to them.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_WUKLAMAT_000_070<tab>Let's not keep Cahciua waiting.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_GRAHATIA_000_075<tab>I have faith in Erenville's inner strength.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_KRILE_000_080<tab>What could this great idea of Cahciua's be?
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_ERENVILLE_000_085<tab>It's not... <sigh>
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_WINDSPATHGARDENSGUARD_000_090<tab><bleep> <bloop> Error. Error. Verification system...initialized. User registration...confirmed.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_WINDSPATHGARDENSGUARD_000_091<tab>Greetings and welcome to Windspath Gardens, the sanctuary of exploration and discovery! The marvels of the natural world await you!
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_WUKLAMAT_000_095<tab>Let's help Cahciua make some great memories!
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_GRAHATIA_000_100<tab>The sanctuary of exploration and discovery... Quite fitting that Cahciua's memories are here.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_KRILE_000_105<tab>How very like Cahciua to chase her dreams to the last.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_ERENVILLE_000_110<tab>...
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_CAHCIUA_000_120<tab>Then with your consent, let's begin our adventure!
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_CAHCIUA_000_121<tab>Naturally, while we go about this, feel free to continue befriending Endless. And be sure to absorb the delightful scenery!
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_WUKLAMAT_000_125<tab>I thought those things were some sort of enormous tree, but they're actually sculptures!
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_GRAHATIA_000_130<tab>The scenery here is nothing short of remarkable. To think that Sphene has managed to preserve it for the Endless...
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_KRILE_000_135<tab>What a lovely garden!
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_ERENVILLE_000_140<tab>...I somehow anticipated this.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_CAHCIUA_000_150<tab>This particular garden is called Blooms of Discovery. Beautiful, isn't it?
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_GRAHATIA_000_151<tab>It's absolutely stunning! And they are all actual plants?
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_CAHCIUA_000_152<tab>They are indeed. These specimens were brought here hundreds of years ago for conservation, as the calamity had pushed them to the brink of extinction.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_KRILE_000_153<tab>So this zone is like a great conservatory.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_CAHCIUA_000_154<tab>Precisely, my dear Krile! Here you'll find flora and fauna the likes of which no longer exist elsewhere.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_CAHCIUA_000_155<tab>Doesn't the thought just set your heart aflutter?
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_ERENVILLE_000_156<tab>I suppose.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_ERENVILLE_000_157<tab>I expect that some creatures I encountered outside of Tural may have cousins in this world.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_ERENVILLE_000_158<tab>While I am no expert on life in the reflections, it would make for an interesting study to compare them.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_CAHCIUA_000_159<tab>Now there's an idea! Leave it to my pupil to think up such.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_CAHCIUA_000_160<tab>Here we have not only a worlds-traversing adventurer and a veteran gleaner, but a pair of Sharlayan's finest scholars besides.
TEXT_KINGMF111_04956_CAHCIUA_000_161<tab>It's a veritable gathering of inquisitiveness, and I'm thrilled to be part of it!
